SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

io.libraft.algorithm
Interface RPCReceiver

All Known Implementing Classes:
RaftAlgorithm
public interface RPCReceiver

Incoming Raft RPC message notification service. This is the interface through which RaftAlgorithm is notified of messages received from other Raft servers. Messages may arrive out of order, may be duplicates, and may arrive from servers that are no longer in the cluster. Messages are sent via the corresponding methods in the RPCSender interface.

The following messages can be received:

  • RequestVote
  • RequestVoteReply
  • AppendEntries
  • AppendEntriesReply

Implementations must guarantee that all incoming messages are well-formed. Implementations can assume that if the recipient throws an exception that the system is in an unrecoverable state and can be halted.

Method Summary
 void onAppendEntries(String server, long term, long commitIndex, long prevLogIndex, long prevLogTerm, Collection<LogEntry> entries)
          Indicates that an AppendEntries was received.
 void onAppendEntriesReply(String server, long term, long prevLogIndex, long entryCount, boolean applied)
          Indicates that an AppendEntriesReply was received.

          Indicates that a RequestVote was received.
 void onRequestVoteReply(String server, long term, boolean voteGranted)
          Indicates that a RequestVoteReply was received.
 

Method Detail

onRequestVote

void onRequestVote(String server,
                   long term,
                   long lastLogIndex,
                   long lastLogTerm)
Indicates that a RequestVote was received.

Parameters:
server - unique id of the Raft server that sent this message
term - election term in which this message was sent
lastLogIndex - index of the last log entry in the Raft server's Raft log at the time the message was sent
lastLogTerm - election term in which the last log entry in the Raft server's Raft log was created

onRequestVoteReply

void onRequestVoteReply(String server,
                        long term,
                        boolean voteGranted)
Indicates that a RequestVoteReply was received. This is a response to a previously-sent RequestVote message.

Parameters:
server - unique id of the Raft server that sent this message
term - election term in which this message was sent
voteGranted - true if server granted its vote to the local Raft server in term, false otherwise

onAppendEntries

void onAppendEntries(String server,
                     long term,
                     long commitIndex,
                     long prevLogIndex,
                     long prevLogTerm,
                     @Nullable
                     Collection<LogEntry> entries)
Indicates that an AppendEntries was received.

Parameters:
server - unique id of the Raft server that sent this message
term - election term in which this message was sent
commitIndex - index of the last LogEntry that server believes is committed. commitIndex may be >= the local Raft server's log length even after all entries are successfully appended
prevLogIndex - index of the LogEntry immediately before the first LogEntry in entries
prevLogTerm - election term in which the LogEntry at prevLogIndex was created
entries - sequence of monotonic, gapless, LogEntry instances with indices prevLogIndex + 1, prevLogIndex + 2 .. prevLogIndex + entries.count(). May be null if this AppendEntries message is a heartbeat
See Also:
LogEntry

onAppendEntriesReply

void onAppendEntriesReply(String server,
                          long term,
                          long prevLogIndex,
                          long entryCount,
                          boolean applied)
Indicates that an AppendEntriesReply was received. This is a response to previously-sent AppendEntries message.

Parameters:
server - unique id of the server that sent this message
term - election term in which this message was sent
prevLogIndex - index of the LogEntry after which log entries were meant to be appended
entryCount - number of log entries meant to be appended to the source server's log. 0, if this is a response to a heartbeat
applied - true if the log prefix uniquely defined by (prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm) in the AppendEntries request matched and the Raft server was able to append the entries prevLogIndex + 1 to prevLogIndex + entryCount to its log. false otherwise
